# knitractive

The `knitractive` package provides a [knitr](https://yihui.name/knitr/) engine
that allows you to simulate interactive sessions (e.g., Python console, Bash
shell) across multiple code chunks. Interactive sessions are run inside a 
[tmux](https://github.com/tmux/tmux/wiki) session through the 
[tmuxr](https://github.com/datascienceworkshops/tmuxr) package.

### Installation

You can install `knitractive` from GitHub with:

```R
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("datascienceworkshops/knitractive")
```
